headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: NRG Energy Stock Surges After Analyst Upgrade
summary: The S&P 500 added 0.6% on Tuesday, Nov. 26, as investors weighed the implications of President-elect Donald Trump's promise to impose new tariffs on Mexico, Canada, and China.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: NRG Energy Stock Surges After Analyst Upgrade
raw.summary: The S&P 500 added 0.6% on Tuesday, Nov. 26, as investors weighed the implications of President-elect Donald Trump's promise to impose new tariffs on Mexico, Canada, and China.

headline: NRG Energy Stock Leads S&P 500 Gains Tuesday After Upgrade From Jefferies
summary: NRG Energy was the S&P 500’s best-performing constituent Tuesday after Jefferies analysts upgraded the stock and raised their price target, saying “investors are sleeping” on the energy company.

raw.headline: NRG Energy Stock Leads S&P 500 Gains Tuesday After Upgrade From Jefferies
raw.summary: NRG Energy was the S&P 500’s best-performing constituent Tuesday after Jefferies analysts upgraded the stock and raised their price target, saying “investors are sleeping” on the energy company.

headline: Top Midday Gainers
summary: Semtech (SMTC) reported late Monday fiscal Q3 earnings and revenue that beat consensus estimates.

headline: NRG Energy Is S&P 500’s Top Stock Today. Why It Gained a Bull.
summary: Jefferies analysts upgrade shares of the energy company to Buy from Hold and raise their price target to $113.
